content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_main (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[resourceType] nvarchar(4000),
	[issued] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[patient_id_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[encounter_id_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[effectiveDateTime] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_unit] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueQuantity_value] float,
	[valueString] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_main',
	DATA_SOURCE = SilverStorage,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFile
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_component (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_text] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_unit] nvarchar(4000),
	[component_valueQuantity_value] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Observation_component',
	DATA_SOURCE = SilverStorage,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFile
	)
GO



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Observation_valueCodeableConcept (
	[Observation_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[valueCodeableConcept_text] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/Observation_valueCodeableConcept/',
	DATA_SOURCE = SilverStorage,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFile
	)
GO
